body:
Comment 5 by **lars@yencken.org**: 
The new test case URL is bad choice, since it's location-specific. For example, in
Australia http://google.com/ redirects to http://www.google.com.au/.

--- FAIL: http.TestRedirect
        Get(http://google.com/) got status 200 at http://www.google.com.au/, want 200 at http://www.google.com/

Best to find something that doesn't depend on the user's location.
